summary:
Social skills and competences
       •     Excellent international work exposure. ( working in Netherlands & worked in Sweden, 
             Germany & Italy)
       •     Good ability to adapt multicultural environment gained through work experience.
       •     Excellent work co ordination skill.

Technical skills and competences	
       •	16 years experience as electrical design engineer (Automotive, Machine & Rail domain).
       •	Electro-mechanical design skills.
       •	Schematic, cabling, cabinets &  harness design skills

Computer skills and competences	
       •	E-CAD tool        : E3 (Zuken & CIM-TEAM), Ruplan, Engineering Base (Aucotec).
       •	CAD tool            : AutoCAD, UG NX 7.0, Catia V5  ( Mechanical / Electrical module)
       •	Database tool    : PDM , VPM (Enovia  3D COM), Team center

Language Proficiency	
Mother tongue	Marathi
                Hindi	Professional User (C2)
             English	Professional User (C2)
               Dutch	Basic User (A2)

profile_positions.description:
•	Deliver architecture design of EUV Scanner Imaging electronics.
•	Deliver functional specification (EPS), test specification (TPS), design specification (EDS),
       qualification document (TAR), Hardware Software Interfaces (HIS), FMEA and other documentations
       for EUV Scanner imaging electronics related functionalities, including safety, reliability, accessibility, 
       serviceability, manufacturability and cost control.
•	Define interfaces between Electronic and Control, thermal, SW domain.
•	Specify, document and maintain safety control infrastructure (PLC’s, remote IO, electrical modules)
       and related firmware.
•	Act as the Electronics representative, interacting intensively in a multidisciplinary design team 
        especially with SW.
•	Make concept designs that meet the international standards on electrical safety and EMC.
•	Perform trade-off studies to determine the preferred implementation scenario for new or changed 
        functions..
•	Guarantee design quality and compliance by knowledge, experience and usage of reviewing and 
        risk reducing tools.
•	Contribute to the roadmap regarding electronics and interfaces (e.g. definitions towards SW 
        diagnostic tooling).
•	Contribute to analysis and solution of reliability issues (e.g. uptime, quality and diagnostics).
•	Act as a technical leader and be able to manage the outsourcing of development activities at 
        co-developers.
•	Act as a technical coach for other team members.
•	Prepare work breakdown and help project leader in planning & in communication with 
        multiple stakeholders (cross-projects).
•	Support and Knowledge Transfer to Electronic, Functional and SW design & production engineers .
•	Assist in problem solving during 1st product integration.
profile_positions.title: Electrical Architect

profile_positions.description:
•  Prepare the technical requirement documents (TRD) & requirement specification(TRS) for 
    passenger car electrical systems such as Infotainment, Remote Keyless Entry, Power window
    reverse parking assist kit, Navigation system.
•  Support for the area of responsibility, to procurement / strategic supply, suppliers & production.
•  Participate in design meetings and reviews during the project design phases.
•  Prototype fitment trial. 
•  Design validation & verification on component level & vehicle level for Electrical   
   systems ( EMC / EMI tests, Climate test, Environmental test, Material test) 
•  Define Electrical interface details. Vehicle harness design & routing concept.

Worked at client General Motors, Talegaon, Pune as Vehicle electrical system &  
    integration engineer (Harness & system design) from May-2012 to 24th May-2013.
profile_positions.title: Technical Leader ( Electrical design )

profile_positions.description:
•	Produce the necessary technical documents for purchase and installation of vehicle cabling.
•	Participate in design meetings and reviews during the project design phases.
•	Detail design of vehicle cabling, cabinets, electrical boxes, generation of wiring tables, cabling 
        & purchase drawings, material lists. 
•	Support for the area of responsibility, to procurement, strategic suppliers & production.
•	Manufacturing process documentation ( 2D drawings, mounting instructions )
•	Prepare project structure & change management in PDM & VPM (Enovia 3D COM).
•	Design and preparation of the vehicle circuit diagram and supporting documents in E3 E-Cad.
•	Participate in the design and realization of the train operation system functions together with the
        functional and electrical integrators, project engineers and system engineers
•	Responsible for electrical work co-ordination & other managerial tasks. 	

	Worked at client Bombardier transportation, Västerås, Sweden as Vehicle cabling &  
        integration engineer (Harness & cabinet design) from August-2008 to October-2011.

	Worked at client Bombardier transportation, Hennigsdorf, Germany as  Vehicle circuit
        diagram engineer from January-2007 to December-2007.
profile_positions.title: Senior Electrical Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Design automobile electrical parts ( Magnetos, Ignition coils, Harnesses, Electrical coils).  
•	Prepare necessary documents for developed products as per Q.S. standard.
        (DFMEA, PFMEA, Process flow diagram, Control plan, APQP, PPAP, kaizen sheet)
•	Factory tests carry out ( vibration, thermal, shock, salt spray, endurance )
•	Vendor development.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Electrical installation design using AutoCAD. 
•	Design control panels depending on special features.
•	Prepare connection diagrams, electrical topology plan & Bill of material.
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Design Magnetos (Alternator), Ignition coils, Harnesses, Electrical coils.  
•	Testing of developed prototypes & prepare pre-production batch.
•	Prepare necessary documents for new developed products as per Q.S. standard.
        (DFMEA, PFMEA, Process flow diagram, Control plan, APQP, PPAP, kaizen sheet)
profile_positions.title: Design Engineer
